chunks.content: Traditional activities begin at the stroke of midnight with the Drummers' Circle. This tradition involves the drum line of the Band of the Fighting Irish and ushers in the rest of the festivities that will continue the rest of the gameday Saturday.

metadata.relevance_reason: This part directly answers the question about what occurs at midnight before a football home game at Notre Dame.
metadata.answer_contribution: Describes the Drummers' Circle tradition that begins at midnight.

required_info: traditions or activities related to the game
